content: पारुष्यं [परुषस्य भावः ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Roughness, ruggedness, hardness. {@--2@} Harshness, cruelty, unkindness (as of disposition). {@--3@} Abusive language, abuse, reproach, scurrilous language, insult; <ls>Bg. 16. 4</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 12</ls>, <ls n="Y. 2.">72.</ls> {@--4@} Violence (in word or deed); <ls>Ms. 8. 6</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">72</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 48</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 7.">51.</ls> {@--5@} The garden of Indra. {@--6@} Aloe wood. --ष्यः An epithet of Bṛhaspati.
